name: Remembrance (itch) (otopoi)
description:
Taking place in a post-apocalyptic world, Remembrance follows a young man as he helps a lonely geezer recall the good 'ol days by fetching various nostalgic items.

WASD - move

E - Menu select/interact

CTRL + R - restart game

CTRL  +F - fullscreen

Port for HTML 5 isn't great so download executable if you want :/

Programmers: Otopoi and Serintonin

Artists: ThatOneJoe and Elijah
